title: PROJECT: ONLINE RETAIL STORE
description: Developed a database for an online retail store, including products, customers, orders, and payments. This project involves more complex queries and database design. Designing tables for products, customers, orders, and payments using SQL queries to handle customer orders and payment processing.

title: Project: EMPLOYEE DATABASE
description: Developed a database for managing employee records, including personal details, job positions, departments, and salaries. This project involves creating complex relationships and queries. Also designing the tables for employees, departments, and job positions by using SQL queries for Employee Database.

title: Project: NumberGuessingGame
description: A simple number guessing game built using C++ Programming. The program provides hints like too high or too low until the correct number is guessed.

title: Project: ToDo List
description: A console-based to-do list application where users can add, remove, and mark tasks as completed. The program allows users to manage their daily tasks efficiently.
